teaser: Netflix has some big media competition.
title: Despite successes, Netflix still an outsider
description: Netflix has some big media competition.
contentencoded: Despite gaining users with new shows like "House of Cards" and "Orange is the New Black" and winning a couple of Creative Arts Emmys over the weekend, Netflix is still an outsider in the entertainment industry. Molly Wood, an executive editor at CNET, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss Netflix's big media competition.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 17, 2013
